name: bootstrap.native
description: Native Javascript for Bootstrap, the sweetest Javascript library without jQuery.

scripts.build: node build.js > dist/bootstrap-native.js && npm run build-min
scripts.build-v4: node build-v4.js > dist/bootstrap-native-v4.js && npm run build-v4-min
scripts.watch: onchange "lib/*/**" -i -- npm run build && npm run build-v4

author: dnp_theme
